infobox.Japanese title:: ポジティブ男の災難  (Pojitibu Otoko no Sainan)

infobox.Animation director:: Asuka Tsubuki  Yoshitsugu Hatano  FALCO Suzuki
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Masanori Hashimoto (sub-character)  Hiroshi Ogawa (design works)

Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Wataru Takagi as Genta Kojima, Wataru Takagi  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Megumi Hayashibara as Ai Haibara  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Nobunaga Shimazaki as Shokichi Hazama, Daikichi Hazama  Fuminori Komatsu as Nenji Kodakara  Hiroko Emori as Teruyo Imaizumi  Yuki Hoshi as Yasushi Tarao  Takahiro Yoshino as Detective  Akira Kuwabara as Woman
